00184    class TableType {
00185    public:
00193       TableType( uint32 poiType,
00194                  const ImageName& name,
00195                  const char* imagePrefix,
00196                  const CodeType& code,
00197                  bool showInSearches ):
00198          m_poiType( poiType ),
00199          m_imageName( name ),
00200          m_imagePrefix( imagePrefix ),
00201          m_code( code ),
00202          m_codeIndex( 0 ),
00203          m_showInSearches( showInSearches ) { }
00205       uint32 getPOIType() const { return m_poiType; }
00207       const CodeType& getCode() const { return m_code; }
00209       const ImageName& getImageName() const { return m_imageName; }
00215       const char* getPrefix() const { return m_imagePrefix; }
00218       ImageName getFullImageName() const { 
00219          if ( m_imagePrefix ) {
00220             return MC2String( getPrefix() ) + getImageName();
00221          }
00222          return getImageName();
00223       }
00224

00299    struct ImageLess {
00300       ImageLess( uint32 poiType ):
00301          m_poiType( poiType ) {
00302       }
00303       bool operator () ( const TableType& type, const ImageName& name ) {
00304          if ( type.getPOIType() != m_poiType ) {
00305             return type.getPOIType() < m_poiType;
00306          }
00307          return type.getImageName() < name;
00308       }
00309 
00310       bool operator () ( const ImageName& name, const TableType& type ) {
00311          if ( m_poiType != type.getPOIType() ) {
00312             return m_poiType < type.getPOIType();
00313          }
00314          return name < type.getImageName();
00315       }
00316 
00317       uint32 m_poiType;
00318    };
00319 
00323    struct SortByImageNameAndPOI {
00324       bool operator () ( const TableType& a, const TableType& b ) {
00325          if ( a.getPOIType() != b.getPOIType() ) {
00326             return a.getPOIType() < b.getPOIType();
00327          }
00328          return a.getImageName() < b.getImageName();
00329       }
00330    };
00331 
00333    struct SortByCode {
00334       SortByCode( const ImageToCodeTable& table ):
00335          m_table( table ) {
00336       }
00338       bool operator () ( uint32 indexA, uint32 indexB ) {
00339          return m_table[ indexA ].getCode() < m_table[ indexB ].getCode();
00340       }
00341 
00342       const ImageToCodeTable& m_table;
00343    };
00344 
00346    struct CodeLess {
00347       CodeLess( const ImageToCodeTable& table ):
00348          m_table( table ) { }
00349 
00350       bool operator () ( uint32 index, const CodeType& code ) {
00351          return m_table[ index ].getCode() < code;
00352       }
00353 
00354       bool operator () ( const CodeType& code, uint32 index ) {
00355          return code < m_table[ index ].getCode();
00356       }
00357 
00358       const ImageToCodeTable& m_table; 
00359    };
